Maya 配置文件文档¶

> 分析：我们将场景中需要的信息分析出来并保存到task.json, asset.json, upload.json, tips.json中，以便进一步解析和处理

### 1.task.json解析

> 说明: 存放场景分析结果、渲染设置等信息

task.json示例

```json {

“scene_info_render”: {
“defaultRenderLayer”: {

“renderable”: “1”, “env”: {}, “is_default_camera”: “1”, “option”: “”, “common”: {

“image_format”: “exr”, “end”: “10”, “width”: “960”, “image_file_prefix”: “”, “all_camera”: [

“stereoCameraRightShape”, “stereoCameraLeftShape”, “stereoCameraCenterCamShape”, “perspShape”, “cameraShape2”, “cameraShape1”

], “render_camera”: [

“cameraShape1”

], “start”: “1”, “animation”: “False”, “renderer”: “mentalRay”, “frames”: “1-10[1]”, “height”: “540”, “renumber_frames”: “False”, “by_frame”: “1”

}

}, “mut”: {

“renderable”: “1”, “is_default_camera”: “1”, “option”: “”, “common”: {

“image_format”: “exr”, “end”: “10”, “width”: “960”, “image_file_prefix”: “”, “all_camera”: [

“stereoCameraRightShape”, “stereoCameraLeftShape”, “stereoCameraCenterCamShape”, “perspShape”, “cameraShape2”, “cameraShape1”

], “render_camera”: [

“cameraShape1”, “stereoCameraLeftShape”

], “start”: “1”, “animation”: “False”, “renderer”: “mentalRay”, “frames”: “1-10[1]”, “height”: “540”, “renumber_frames”: “False”, “by_frame”: “1”

}

}

}, “layers”: [

“defaultRenderLayer”, “mut”

], “task_info”: {

“enable_layered”: “1”, “cg_id”: “2000”, “ram”: “64”, “os_name”: “1”, “render_layer_type”: “0”, “is_distribute_render”: “0”, “input_cg_file”: “D:/chensr/scene/maya2016_multi_layers_cameras.ma”, “job_stop_time”: “28800”, “user_id”: “10000031”, “pre_frames”: “000”, “platform”: “2”, “is_picture”: “0”, “project_id”: “3316”, “channel”: “4”, “tiles_type”: “block”, “tiles”: “1”, “project_name”: “dasdd”, “distribute_render_node”: “3”, “frames_per_task”: “1”, “stop_after_test”: “2”, “input_project_path”: “”, “task_id”: “439800”, “task_stop_time”: “86400”, “time_out”: “12”, “graphics_cards_num”: “2”

}, “software_config”: {

“cg_version”: “2016”, “cg_name”: “Maya”, “plugins”: {}

}

}¶

task.json参数解析

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th>是否必须</th> <th>说明</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>software_config</td> <td>object</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染环境（软件类型、版本和用到的插件等）</td> <td><a href=”#software_config”>见software_config对象解析</a></td> </tr> <tr> <td>task_info</td> <td>object</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染设置（优先帧、渲染帧数、超时时间等）</td> <td><a href=”#task_info”>见task_info对象解析</a></td> </tr> <tr> <td>scene_info_render</td> <td>object</td> <td>Y</td> <td>场景的分析结果（场景中的渲染节点、输出路径等）</td> <td><a href=”#scene_info_render”>见scene_info_render对象解析</a></td> </tr> <tr> <td>layers</td> <td>list</td> <td>Y</td> <td>所有层信息，值是“scene_info_render”中的层名称</td> <td>”layers”: [<br/> “defaultRenderLayer”,<br/> “mut”,<br/> ]</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

<span id=”software_config”>software_config对象解析</span>

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th>是否必须</th> <th>说明</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>cg_name</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>软件名称</td> <td>”Maya”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>cg_version</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>软件版本</td> <td>”2016”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>plugins</td> <td>object</td> <td>Y</td> <td>插件对象。<br> 为插件名称，value为插件版本</td> <td>{}</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

<span id=”task_info”>task_info对象解析</span>

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th>是否必须</th> <th>说明</th> <th>默认值</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>graphics_cards_num</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>1: 开启单卡渲染 2: 开启双卡渲染</td> <td>”2”</td> <td>“2”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>enable_layered</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>是否开启分层提交, “0”:关闭 “1”:开启</td> <td>”0”</td> <td>”0”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>cg_id</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染软件id.”2000”: Maya</td> <td></td> <td>”2013”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>ram</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>内存要求: 64 / 128</td> <td>“64”</td> <td>”64”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>os_name</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染操作系统: “0”:Linux; “1”: Windows</td> <td>“1”</td> <td>”1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>render_layer_type</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染层方式选择: “0”：renderlayer方式 “1”：rendersetup方式</td> <td>“0”</td> <td>”0”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>is_distribute_render</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>是否开启分布式渲染: “0”:关闭 “1”:开启</td> <td>“0”</td> <td>”0”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>input_cg_file</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染场景本地路径</td> <td></td> <td>”E:/copy/DHGB_sc05_zhuta_610-1570_v0102.project”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>input_project_path</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>项目路径，如用户未设置传空字符串</td> <td>” “</td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>job_stop_time</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>设置帧的超时时间，只会影响当前帧, 单位秒</td> <td>“259200”</td> <td>”28800”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>user_id</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>用户ID</td> <td></td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>pre_frames</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>优先渲染(优先帧不建议自定义多个单独帧)</td> <td>“000”</td> <td>”000:1,3-4[1]” 表示： 优先渲染首帧：否 优先渲染中间帧：否 优先渲染末帧：否 优先渲染自定义帧：1,3-4[1]</td> </tr> <tr> <td>platform</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>提交平台: “2”: “www2”, “3”: “www3”, “6”: “www4”, “21”: “gpu”,</td> <td></td> <td>”2”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>is_picture</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>“0: 效果图 “1”: 动画图</td> <td>“0”</td> <td>”0”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>channel</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>1:web本地分析(动画扣费); 2:web云端分析; 3:效果图插件提交； 4：API/SDK提交; 8：动画插件提交</td> <td>“4”</td> <td>”4”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>tiles_type</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>”block(分块),strip(分条)”</td> <td>“block”</td> <td>”block”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>tiles</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>分块数量，大于1就分块或者分条，等于1 就是单机</td> <td>”1”</td> <td>”1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>project_id</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>项目id</td> <td></td> <td>”200953”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>project_name</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>项目名称</td> <td>” “</td> <td>”Project1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>distribute_render_node</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>分布式渲染机器数</td> <td>”3”</td> <td>”3”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>frames_per_task</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>一机渲多帧的帧数量</td> <td>”1”</td> <td>”1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>stop_after_test</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>优先渲染完成后是否暂停任务 “1”:优先渲染完成后暂停任务 “2”.优先渲染完成后不暂停任务</td> <td>”2”</td> <td>“2”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>task_id</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>任务号</td> <td></td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>task_stop_time</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>大任务超时停止 单位秒,”0”表示不限制</td> <td>”0”</td> <td>”86400”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>time_out</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>超时时间 单位秒</td> <td>“43200”</td> <td>”43200”</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

> 注意: > - 开启分层(enable_layered)才可以使用分块渲染，分块渲染模式(tiles_type)和一机多帧渲染模式(frames_per_task)互斥关系，只能同时使用一种模式 > - Maya暂时不支持分布式渲染(is_distribute_render)。

<span id=”scene_info_render”>scene_info_render对象解析</span>

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th><strong>参数</strong></th> <th><strong>类型</strong></th> <th><strong>是否必须</strong></th> <th><strong>说明</strong></th> <th><strong>示例</strong></th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td><strong>layer</strong></td> <td><strong>object</strong></td> <td><strong>Y</strong></td> <td><strong>层信息</strong></td> <td><strong><a href=”#scene_info_render.layer”>见scene_info_render.layer对象解析</a></strong></td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

<span id=”scene_info_render.layer”>scene_info_render.layer对象解析</span>

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th></th> <th>说明</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>renderable</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染层开关</td> <td>”1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>env</td> <td>object</td> <td>N</td> <td>环境信息</td> <td>{}</td> </tr> <tr> <td>is_default_camera</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>是否使用默认相机，默认值为‘1’(使用默认相机)</td> <td>”1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>option</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>渲染器对应信息</td> <td>””</td> </tr> <tr> <td>common</td> <td>object</td> <td>Y</td> <td>场景普通信息</td> <td><a href=”#scene_info_render.layer.common”>见scene_info_render.layer.common对象解析</a></td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

<span id=”scene_info_render.layer.common”>scene_info_render.layer.common对象解析</span>

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th>是否必须</th> <th>说明</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>image_format</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染元素输出文件类型</td> <td>”jpg”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>end</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>结束帧</td> <td>”100”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>width</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>分辨率，宽</td> <td>”1920”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>image_file_prefix</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>输出文件名设置，”<RenderLayer>/<Scence>”</td> <td>””</td> </tr> <tr> <td>all_camera</td> <td>array<string></td> <td>Y</td> <td>所有相机列表</td> <td>[“stereoCameraRightShape”, “cameraShape1”]</td> </tr> <tr> <td>render_camera</td> <td>array<string></td> <td>Y</td> <td>待渲染相机列表</td> <td>[“stereoCameraRightShape”]</td> </tr> <tr> <td>start</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>起始帧</td> <td>”1”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>animation</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>动画开关</td> <td>”False”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>renderer</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染器名称</td> <td>“arnold“</td> </tr> <tr> <td>frames</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>渲染帧</td> <td>”1-10[1]”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>height</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>分辨率，高</td> <td>”1080”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>renumber_frames</td> <td>string</td> <td>N</td> <td>帧覆盖</td> <td>”False”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>by_frame</td> <td>string</td> <td>Y</td> <td>帧间隔</td> <td>”1”</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

### 2.upload.json解析

> 说明: 存放需要上传的资产路径信息

upload.json示例 ```json {

“asset”: [
{

“local”: “D:/chensr/scene/maya2016_multi_layers_cameras.ma”, “server”: “/D/chensr/scene/maya2016_multi_layers_cameras.ma”

}

]

}¶

upload.json参数解析

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th>说明</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>asset</td> <td>object</td> <td>需要上传的资产路径信息</td> <td><a href=”#asset”>见asset对象解析</a></td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

<span id=”asset”>asset对象解析</span>

<table border=”1” class=”docutils”> <thead> <tr> <th>参数</th> <th>类型</th> <th>说明</th> <th>示例</th> </tr> </thead> <tbody> <tr> <td>local</td> <td>string</td> <td>资产本地路径</td> <td>”D:/chensr/scene/maya2016_multi_layers_cameras.ma”</td> </tr> <tr> <td>server</td> <td>string</td> <td>服务器端相对路径，一般与local保持一致</td> <td>”/D/chensr/scene/maya2016_multi_layers_cameras.ma”</td> </tr> </tbody> </table>

### 3.tips.json解析

> 说明: 存放分析出的错误、警告信息

`json {} `
